TopicTitle: KG-12 Finch Light Ground Attack/Trainer (Updated for 1.05)

Articles.Content:
Is a light Ground Attack aircraft that could also be used as an advanced trainer. It is fast and maneuverable. Updated for 1.05 it includes an engine swap to the Panther engine, enhanced maneuverability, and upgraded missiles that are very accurate.

Weapons consist of two rocket powered kinetic missiles and one kinetic bomb in the bomb bay. These loads could be reconfigured for more conventional explosives. Action Group 1 toggles the bomb bay.

Download

Edited February 12, 2016 by selfish_meme
Update
Really nice craft selfish-meme, with a Wheesley and that much fuel the craft should be able to travel half way around Kerbin!...haha
